55.name: INCREASED STARTING AMMO
55.description_long: Helldiver deploys with maximum number of magazines for their weapons.

67.name: EXPERIMENTAL SUPER SOLDIERS
67.description_long: The Helldiver has faster stamina regeneration and slowly regenerates health and injuries automatically.

70.name: INTEL SCANNERS
70.description_long: The location of Intel is indicated on the mini-map.

71.name: COMPROMISED INTEL PACKAGES
71.description_long: Intel Packages are compromised. Picking them up will notify the enemy of your whereabouts and cause an encounter.

76.name: IMPENETRABLE DEFENSE
76.description_long: The defenses of this planet are so strong that no enemy will be able to invade.

77.name: CRIPPLED SUPPLY
77.description_long: The ability of this planet to attack is crippled.

87.name: INCREASED SUPPLIES
87.description_long: Ammo and Supply boxes contains #V_ONE more magazine and #V_TWO extra rounds each.

113.name: PLENTYFUL STIMS
113.description_long: Health Packs and Supply boxes contains #V_ONE more Stim Packs.

114.name: DECREASED SUPPLIES
114.description_long: Ammo and Supply boxes contains #V_ONE less magazine and #V_TWO fewer rounds.

121.name: MARKET CRASH
121.description_long: Due to the risk of Famine, the market is concerned and prices have gone up #V_ONE%.

122.name: MACHINE GUN INCENTIVE
122.description_long: The local governor has decided to hand out free machine guns as an extra carrot to save this planet.

123.name: GMO'S IN STIMS?
123.description_long: The growing concern over the use of GMO in Combat Stims have caused drops in production.

124.name: GMO'S IN HEALTH PACKS?
124.description_long: The growing concern over the use of GMO have caused drops in production.

1159.description_long: 50% bonus to Requisition and XP awarded per mission

1195.name: DSS CONSTRUCTION SITE - PHASE 1
1195.description_short: Construction has begun on the Democracy Space Station. The local populace is honored to host thousands of construction crews for this historic event.

1196.name: DSS LOGISTICS HUB
1196.description_short: Parts for the Democracy Space Station are prefabricated all over the Galaxy, then shipped here to await assembly.

1197.name: XENOENTOMOLOGY CENTRE
1197.description_short: Those who study Terminid behaviour, ecology and E-710 potential gather here for cross-disciplinary research.

1198.name: DEEP MANTLE FORGE COMPLEX
1198.description_short: The smelters and refineries on this planet turn crude materials into usable hardware.

1199.name: DSS CONSTRUCTION SITE- PHASE 2
1199.description_short: Democracy Space Station construction is well underway. The local economy is flourishing as the planet's populace has centupled, and all the Galaxy can feel their democratic fervor.

1200.name: WEAPONS EXPERIMENTATION
1200.description_short: The #V_ONE stratagem is available to all Helldivers.

1202.name: THE JET BRIGADE
1202.description_short: These upgraded bots utilize stolen Jump Pack technology, heartlessly pillaged from the bodies of fallen Helldivers and reverse-engineered into something nearly unrecognizable.

1204.name: LIBERTY DAY
1204.description_short: This planet is celebrating Liberty Day.

1205.name: DSS CONSTRUCTION SITE - PHASE 3
1205.description_short: Construction of the Democracy Space Station is nearing completion. This project, which has employed millions, will soon take its place among the greatest achievements of Democracy.

1206.name: TERMINID RESEARCH PRESERVE
1206.description_short: Terminids are held safely within massive compounts on this planet for study and E-710 extraction.

1207.name: WEAPONS EXPERIMENTATION
1207.description_short: The #V_ONE stratagem is available to all Helldivers.

1208.name: PLANETARY BOMBARDMENT
1208.description_short: The DSS fires Orbital Barrages during missions.

1209.name: EAGLE STORM
1209.description_short: The DSS deploys Eagle Strafing Runs during missions.

1214.name: PLANETARY BOMBARDMENT
1214.description_short: Progress in Liberation Campaigns is accelerated.

1215.name: ORBITAL BLOCKADE
1215.description_short: Defense Campaigns cannot originate from this planet.

1216.name: EAGLE STORM
1216.description_short: Enemy progress in Defense Campaigns is slowed.

1226.name: WEAPONS EXPERIMENTATION
1226.description_short: The #V_ONE stratagem is available to all Helldivers.

1227.name: WEAPONS EXPERIMENTATION
1227.description_short: The #V_ONE stratagem is available to all Helldivers.

1228.name: MERIDIAN BLACK HOLE
1228.description_short: The prosperous Meridia was corrupted into a Terminid Supercolony, necessitating its destruction using the mysterious Dark Fluid.  This galactic scar is all that remains.

1229.name: MERIDIAN BLACK HOLE [Can Travel To]
1229.description_short: The prosperous Meridia was corrupted into a Terminid Supercolony, necessitating its destruction using the mysterious Dark Fluid.  This galactic scar is all that remains.

1230.name: MERIDIAN BLACK HOLE [Can't Travel To]
1230.description_short: The prosperous Meridia was corrupted into a Terminid Supercolony, necessitating its destruction using the mysterious Dark Fluid.  This galactic scar is all that remains.

1231.name: WEAPONS EXPERIMENTATION
1231.description_short: The #V_ONE stratagem is available to all Helldivers.

1232.name: FACTORY HUB
1232.description_short: The hard workers on this planet produce goods vital to the war effort, as well as to the prosperity of Super Earth.

1233.name: WEAPONS EXPERIMENTATION
1233.description_short: The #V_ONE stratagem is available to all Helldivers.

1234.name: CENTER OF SCIENCE
1234.description_short: On this planet, the Ministry of Science's best and brightest work on their next breakthrough.

1235.name: WEAPONS EXPERIMENTATION
1235.description_short: The #V_ONE stratagem is available to all Helldivers.

1236.name: CENTER FOR CIVILIAN SURVEILLANCE AND SAFETY
1236.description_short: The Ministry of Truth analyzes citizens' activity, speech, data, DNA, RNA, and neural topology here.

1237.name: WEAPONS EXPERIMENTATION
1237.description_short: The #V_ONE stratagem is available to all Helldivers.

1238.name: OPERATIONAL SUPPORT
1238.description_short: The presence of the DSS near this planet provides a slight boost to Liberation Campaign progress.

1239.name: JET BRIGADE FACTORIES
1239.description_short: Vertically enhanced Jet Brigade soldiers are produced here.

1240.name: VERGE OF DESTRUCTION
1240.description_short: This planet is under threat of destruction.

1241.name: FRACTURED PLANET
1241.description_short: All that remains of a planet torn apart by the Meridian singularity. A solemn reminder of the desolation Tyranny leaves in its wake.

1242.name: MOVING PLANET
1242.description_short: This planet is moving and could collide with others.

1243.name: PREDATOR STRAIN
1243.description_short: A Gloom-enhanced strain of Terminids has been reported on this planet. SEAF patrols have been lured into ambushes, and picked off by unseen assailants. Every ounce of a Helldiver's superior senses will be required to hunt down this dangerous threat.

1244.name: GLOOM BURSTER STRAIN
1244.description_short: A Gloom-enhanced strain of Terminids has been reported on this planet. They can explode into spores

1247.name: WEAPONS EXPERIMENTATION
1247.description_short: The #V_ONE stratagem is available to all Helldivers.

1248.name: INCINERATION CORPS
1248.description_short: An Automaton unit equipped with flame throwers and incendiary ammunition is active on this planet. These wanton arsonists will not rest until they have razed all that mankind holds dear.

1252.name: FRACTURED PLANET
1252.description_short: All that remains of a planet torn apart by the Meridian singularity. A solemn reminder of the desolation Tyranny leaves in its wake.

1254.name: WEAPONS EXPERIMENTATION
1254.description_short: The #V_ONE stratagem is available to all Helldivers.

1256.name: WEAPONS EXPERIMENTATION
1256.description_short: The #V_ONE stratagem is available to all Helldivers.

1257.name: BATTLEFIELD IMPACT
1257.description_short: Cascading logistical distruptions have resulted in the temporary emplacement of ammunition rationing measures. Resupply pod ammunition will be decreased for all operations on this planet until further notice.

1258.name: BATTLEFIELD IMPACT
1258.description_short: Cryo-good transport is facing interdictions by Automaton fleets, reducing Reinforcements for all operations on this planet in the short term.

1261.name: EXOSUIT RESERVES
1261.description_short: The presence of the DSS near this planet provides a -35% cooldown reduction to all Exosuit stratagems.

1262.name: EXOSUIT RESERVES
1262.description_short: The presence of the DSS near this planet provides a -35% cooldown reduction to the EXO-49 Emancipator Exosuit stratagem.

1263.name: WEAPONS EXPERIMENTATION
1263.description_short: The #V_ONE stratagem is available to all Helldivers.

1268.name: Negative Energy Laboratory
1268.description_short: Scientists without fear of implosion or spaghettification study negative energy here.

1269.name: THE GREAT HOST
1269.description_short: The Illuminate invasion fleet, constructed in secret behind the veil of the Meridian Wormhole. It is headed for Super Earth itself.

1274.name: WEAPONS EXPERIMENTATION
1274.description_short: The #V_ONE stratagem is available to all Helldivers.

1276.name: WEAPONS EXPERIMENTATION
1276.description_short: The #V_ONE stratagem is available to all Helldivers.

1277.name: WEAPONS EXPERIMENTATION
1277.description_short: The #V_ONE stratagem is available to all Helldivers.

1279.name: WEAPONS EXPERIMENTATION
1279.description_short: The #V_ONE stratagem is available to all Helldivers.

1280.name: WEAPONS EXPERIMENTATION
1280.description_short: The #V_ONE stratagem is available to all Helldivers.

1281.name: WEAPONS EXPERIMENTATION
1281.description_short: The #V_ONE stratagem is available to all Helldivers.

1282.name: HELLDIVER TRAINING FACILITIES
1282.description_short: Here, the best of the best go through the rigorous Helldiver training that will earn them their capes.

1286.name: MAXIMUM SECURITY CITY CONSTRUCTION SITE
1286.description_short: One of 3 Maximum Security Cities is under construction here.

1287.name: NEW HOPE CITY
1287.description_short: The flagship Maximum Security City. Impregnable to Tyranny; the future of the Federation.

1289.name: ARSENAL BOOST
1289.description_short: High Command has authorized high-volume use of the Orbital Railcannon Stratagem. The mandated waiting period between salvos has been lowered significantly.

1291.name: NEW ASPIRATION CITY
1291.description_short: One of 3 Maximum Security Cities. Impregnable to Tyranny; the future of the Federation

1292.name: NEW YEARNING CITY
1292.description_short: One of 3 Maximum Security Cities. Impregnable to Tyranny; the future of the Federation

1295.name: TYRANNY PARK 2
1295.description_short: The extensive Terminid enclosures here allow scientists to study Terminid behaviour, and civilians to take pictures with Brood Commanders.

1298.name: FACTORY HUB EVACUATED
1298.description_short: The Factory Hub has been evacuated. FRV cooldowns have been increased.

1299.name: LOW-ORBIT INTERDICTION
1299.description_short: Illuminate assault forces have deployed heavy low-orbit anti-air patrols to interdict space-to-ground aircraft. Extraction time on missions against the Illuminate will take significantly longer.

1303.name: RUPTURE STRAIN
1303.description_short: A deadly strain of ground-bursting Terminids is present on this planet.

1304.name: OUTPOST ALPHA
1304.description_short: The first manned site established in Gloom-infested space.

1305.name: GLOOM INTERFERENCE
1305.description_short: Due to adverse spore conditions, Pelican pilots must exercise extreme caution when executing landing manoeuvres. Extraction times have increased by 50s.

1306.name: DRAGONROACHES
1306.description_short: Terminid Dragonroaches menace the skies of this planet.

1307.name: HIVE LORDS
1307.description_short: Terminid Hive Lords have been detected on this planet.

1312.name: LIGHT GLOOM COVER
1312.description_short: Gloom particles interfere with landing Pelicans, increasing extraction times by 20 seconds.

1313.name: MODERATE GLOOM BLANKET
1313.description_short:
The Gloom covers this planet completely, obstructing a variety of logistical operations.
Extraction times are increased by 30 seconds and Eagle Rearm time is increased by 20%.

1315.name: HEAVY GLOOM SHROUD
1315.description_short:
This planet is completely engulfed by the Gloom, severely impeding logistical support.
Extraction times are increased by 40 seconds, Eagle Rearm time is increased by 30% and Ammo from pickups is reduced by 50%.

1318.name: GLOOM SOURCE
1318.description_short:
This planet continually produces a thick atmospheric Gloom cover, rendering logistical support extremely challenging.
Total Reinforcements are reduced by 20%, Eagle Rearm time is increased by 30% and Ammo from pickups is reduced by 50%.

1324.name: ULGRAMAFIC MINE
1324.description_short: A mine extracting platinum from deep-seated deposits of igneous rock.
